post.description:
Submit or update a review for an application.

If the reviewer has already reviewed this application, their review is updated.
After submitting, the application status is recalculated based on the approval strategy.

get.description: Get a summary of reviews for an application.

List applications pending review by the current user.

Returns IN_REVIEW applications the user has not yet reviewed.
If the user is a designated reviewer, scopes to their assigned popups.
Otherwise (admin without reviewer assignment), returns all IN_REVIEW
applications they haven't reviewed yet.

get.description:
List all tickets for the current human (Portal).

Returns all attendee records linked to this human, including:
- Attendees from applications they submitted (main attendee)
- Attendees created by others with their email (e.g., spouse tickets)

Each attendee includes their check-in code and purchased products.

post.description:
Preview a payment calculation without creating it (Portal).

Returns the calculated amount with any applicable discounts.

Create a payment for current human's application (Portal).

If the total is zero or negative (covered by credit), the products
are immediately assigned and no payment record is created - returns
PaymentPreview with approved status.

Otherwise, returns PaymentPublic with checkout URL.

Webhook endpoint for SimpleFI payment notifications.

Called by SimpleFI when payment status changes.
Validates signature using the popup's simplefi_api_key.

Generate a presigned URL for direct upload to storage.

The client should:
1. Call this endpoint to get an upload URL
2. PUT the file directly to the upload_url with the correct Content-Type
3. Use the returned key or public_url when saving to the database

get.description:
Get registration statistics for a popup.

Returns aggregated statistics for applications, attendees, and payments
in a single API call for efficient dashboard rendering.

parameters.name: popup_id

schema.description: Popup ID to get stats for
schema.title: Popup Id

parameters.description: Popup ID to get stats for

ApplicationAdminCreate.title: ApplicationAdminCreate
ApplicationAdminCreate.description:
Application schema for admin creation.

Admins can create applications on behalf of users and set any status.
If email is provided and human doesn't exist, a new Human record is created.
Companions (spouse/kids) can be added during initial submission.

ApplicationAdminUpdate.title: ApplicationAdminUpdate
ApplicationAdminUpdate.description: Application schema for admin updates (can set any status).

ApplicationCreate.title: ApplicationCreate
ApplicationCreate.description:
Application schema for creation.

Profile fields can be provided here and will update the Human record.
Companions (spouse/kids) can be added during initial submission.

ApplicationUpdate.title: ApplicationUpdate
ApplicationUpdate.description:
Application schema for updates by the applicant.

Profile fields will update the Human record.

ApprovalStrategyCreate.title: ApprovalStrategyCreate
ApprovalStrategyCreate.description: Schema for creating an approval strategy.

ApprovalStrategyUpdate.title: ApprovalStrategyUpdate
ApprovalStrategyUpdate.description: Schema for updating an approval strategy.

AttendeesDirectoryEntry.title: AttendeesDirectoryEntry
AttendeesDirectoryEntry.description: Single entry in the attendees directory.

AuthCodeSentResponse.title: AuthCodeSentResponse
AuthCodeSentResponse.description: Response after successfully sending auth code.

CompanionCreate.title: CompanionCreate
CompanionCreate.description:
Schema for creating companion attendees (spouse/kids) during application.

Used when submitting an application with family members.
Category is restricted to spouse/kid (main is auto-created from applicant).

CouponValidate.title: CouponValidate
CouponValidate.description: Schema for validating a coupon code.

DirectoryProduct.title: DirectoryProduct
DirectoryProduct.description: Minimal product info for directory participation display.

GroupAdminUpdate.title: GroupAdminUpdate
GroupAdminUpdate.description: Group schema for admin updates (full access).

GroupMemberCreate.title: GroupMemberCreate
GroupMemberCreate.description: Schema for adding a member to a group.

GroupMemberPublic.title: GroupMemberPublic
GroupMemberPublic.description: Schema for member response with products.

GroupMemberUpdate.title: GroupMemberUpdate
GroupMemberUpdate.description: Schema for updating a group member.

GroupUpdate.title: GroupUpdate
GroupUpdate.description: Group schema for updates (limited fields for leaders).

HumanProfileUpdate.title: HumanProfileUpdate
HumanProfileUpdate.description: Schema for humans updating their own profile

HumanVerify.title: HumanVerify
HumanVerify.description: Request to verify human authentication code.

PaymentUpdate.title: PaymentUpdate
PaymentUpdate.description: Schema for updating a payment (mainly status updates).

PopupReviewerCreate.title: PopupReviewerCreate
PopupReviewerCreate.description: Schema for adding a reviewer to a popup.

PopupReviewerUpdate.title: PopupReviewerUpdate
PopupReviewerUpdate.description: Schema for updating a popup reviewer.

PresignedUrlRequest.title: PresignedUrlRequest
PresignedUrlRequest.description: Request to generate a presigned upload URL.

PresignedUrlResponse.title: PresignedUrlResponse
PresignedUrlResponse.description: Response with presigned URL for upload.

ProductBatchItem.title: ProductBatchItem
ProductBatchItem.description: Single product in a batch import (popup_id is top-level).

ProductCategory.title: ProductCategory
ProductCategory.description: Product categories determining which fields are relevant.

ReviewSummary.title: ReviewSummary
ReviewSummary.description: Summary of reviews for an application.

SimpleFIPriceDetails.title: SimpleFIPriceDetails
SimpleFIPriceDetails.description: Price details for a SimpleFI transaction.

UserSettableStatus.title: UserSettableStatus
UserSettableStatus.description: Statuses that users can set (subset of ApplicationStatus).
